## isBaseTask() function

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Check whether a given value is an [IBaseTask](./types.ibasetask.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function isBaseTask(arg: any): arg is IBaseTask;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  arg | any | value to check |

<b>Returns:</b>

arg is [IBaseTask](./types.ibasetask.md)

## Example


```ts
const task = { title:"This interface is supposed to be extended", labels:[], comments:[], users:[] };
isBaseTask(task); // true

```
